items.content_html: This project is a simple web application built using a frontend framework that displays random quotes with the click of a button. It allows users to explore various quotes and offers a refreshing and dynamic experience. The app is lightweight, easy to use, and a perfect example of how to integrate API data into a web project.
items.title: RedHatPixel/random-quote-generator: This project is a simple web application built using a frontend framework that displays random quotes with the click of a button. It allows users to explore various quotes and offers a refreshing and dynamic experience. The app is lightweight, easy to use, and a perfect example of how to integrate API data into a web project.

items.content_html: YIDE: a lightweight online front-end compiler, with React and Typescript as the front end, Egg.js as the back end, support html, js, css and markdown compilation, is a small helper to validate ideas, practice ideas and write documents.

items.content_html: The safeness-prevnames module is a lightweight Node.js client designed to interact with an API that stores previous usernames of Discord users. This client allows you to retrieve, save, delete, count, and manage previous usernames both via an API and locally using SQLite.
items.title: pertinentes/safeness-prevnames: The safeness-prevnames module is a lightweight Node.js client designed to interact with an API that stores previous usernames of Discord users. This client allows you to retrieve, save, delete, count, and manage previous usernames both via an API and locally using SQLite.
